                             boolean aceDown)
        Sorts cards into descending order.
        Parameters:
        sortBy - The variable we sort the the cards upon.
        aceDown - Boolean if the ace is considered as 1 or 14.
        Returns:

      • makeUniqueInRanks

        private Card[] makeUniqueInRanks(Card[] cards)
        Asks for some cards and in case of it has more cards with the same rank, it deletes the same ranked cards and keeps only one.
        Parameters:
        cards - The cards that might have more cards with the same rank.
        Returns:
        The unique ranked cards.

      • hexToInt

        private int hexToInt(char hex)
        Converts q hex number into decimal. If it is ace in down (1), it rounds up to 14.
        Parameters:
        hex - The char in hex format.
        Returns:
        The value of the char in decimal.

      • intToHex

        private char intToHex(int n)
        Converts decimal number to hex. The number should be between 0 and 15 exclusive, other values are not reachable.
        Parameters:
        n - The number.
        Returns:
        The hex format of the number.
